description: T.1 Bay - Reduce height by 4m and sides by 2.5m shaping to suitable growth points.T.2 Cypress - Crown lift secondary growth only to 5.5m from ground level & deadwood.T.3 Acer - 2m Holistic crown reduction & reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.4 Cherry - 1m Holistic crown reduction & remove large root growing in drive.T.5 Thuja - Crown lift to 5.5m from ground level & remove dead top.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
